RelatedContent.description: WCAG provides guidelines on how to make web content more accessible to people with disabilities, ensuring that websites are usable by all.
Ensure your website can be navigated using just a keyboard, which is essential for users with motor impairments.
Ensure sufficient contrast between text and background colors, and allow users to adjust text size for better readability.
Provide alternative text (alt text) for all images so that screen readers can describe them to users with visual impairments.
